resources.string: 2019 OneTrickPonies Inc.\n This app is property of the Waikato Institute of Technology

Founded in 2019, OneTrickPonies aspires to give all of our clients a fantastic app. Our philosophy is that every customer should have an app that will be a useful tool in their workplace or even their day to day lives. \n \n Whether you’re a large fortune 500 company, a small start-up, or even just one person with a dream, we will fulfill the requests, big or small.

string-array.name: title_array
string-array.item: Information about Te Kōpu Mānia o Kirikiriroa
Ko Ngā Whakairo o te Marae

string-array.name: content_array
string-array.item: I ahu mai te ingoa Te Kōpu Mānia o Kirikiriroa i te wāhi e rongonui nei mō te one-mātua me ngā māra kai i honohono, I kōtuitui, i ngā hapū o Waikato i noho i ngā tahataha o Te Awa o Waikato. Mō ākoranga atu anō mō te marae , pato i kōnei
Mo akoranga kee atu mo ngā whakairo ,pato i kōnei

Kei te marae ātea he pou, 7.5 mīta te teitei, e tū ana. He ōrite tōna āhua ki tō te waka.
E anga atu tenei pou, arā te Waka Maumahara, ki Taupiri Maunga. Kei runga i te waka maumahara, tētahi kaahu e tū ana, he tohu mō Te Arikinui Dame Te Atairangikaahu.
Kei raro iho o tēnei, e whakairohia ana e rima niho taniwha, he tohu mō ngā Kīngi Māori tokorima. E whakaaturia ana te ako me te mātauranga e ngā manaia me ngā matakupenga whakairo ki waenganui, me te whakairo pūhoro, he tohu mō te Awa o Waikato.
Ko ngā pou whakarae e whitu e tata ana ki te waka maumahara e tohu ana I te kāhui whetū a Matariki. He tino a Matariki ki te ahurea o Tainui, ki te iwi Māori whānui hoki.
Kua whakairohia tēnei ki tētahi rākau tōtara i tū ki runga i te wāhi o Wintec i mua. Ko te tukutuku kei muri i te pou-tūā-rangi i ahu mai i te wharenui o Wintec o mua, arā ko Te Kākano a Te Kaahu.

Kei runga i te pakitara o muri o te wharenui te pou-tūā-rongo, te whakairo o Tāwhaki nāna tiki i ngā kete o te wānanga. Ko tana āhua, he tiro atu ki te tomokanga me Te Ao Mārama. Kua whakairohia hoki tēnei ki te tōtara i tū ki te wāhi o Wintec i mua.

Ngā hoahoa o te tomokanga he mea pōwhiri i ngā iwi o te ao ki Wintec. Ko te whakairo kei waenganui o te tomokanga ka whakaatu i ngā hapū o Tainui e pōwhiri i ngā manuwhiri ki runga i te marae. Ka whakaaturia hoki te mātauranga Māori me ngā korero mō te orokohanga o te ao e ai ki Tainui

Kei runga I te pare e toru ngā tohu o ngā kete wānanga. Ka whakaaturia hoki ētahi wahanga o te orokohanga o te ao, e ai ki Tainui i roto i ngā hoahoa. Ko ngā manaia me ngā takarangi e tohu atu ana i te angitū me te whakawhanaketanga. Ko te ngao matariki i ngā tahataha o ngā whakawae e tohu ana i te pōwhiri I ngā ahurea, me ngā iwi o te ao.
Kua whakairohia te taniwhā Tūheitia i te kōrupe, i runga Iite matapihi o mua o Te Kākano a Te Kaahu, me ngā ngao matariki, manaia hoki.
